channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump prompted a battle over voting maps. Here's how redistricting affects voters
item.description: In a battle prompted by President Trump, Texas and California could redraw lines that change whose votes really matter in the 2026 congressional elect...

item.title: Trump's D.C. 'crisis' enters 2nd week with more soldiers — and no exit strategy
item.description: Leaders in Washington, D.C., say they're striving to maintain calm as growing numbers of National Guard soldiers deploy to the city. President Trump h...

item.title: What's behind the Trump administration's immigration memes?
item.description: White supremacist tropes and ironic viral jokes illustrate the administration's project of redefining who belongs in the United States.

item.title: Three innovations pushing the medical field forward
item.description: Innovation is crucial for long-term economic prosperity. One area where that’s happening aplenty: medical technology. From a cancer vaccine to an Alzh...

item.title: Gold rush could bring open pit mines to Black Hills in South Dakota
item.description: Miners want to return to the treasured landscape, promising an economic boost while raising fears of how modern gold extraction could forever change t...

item.title: California Democrats’ push for redistricting faces a tight legislative deadline
BBC witnesses Israeli settlers' attack on Palestinian farm in West Bank
item.description: A BBC team was interviewing a Palestinian farmer when masked men charged towards them.

item.title: War-torn Myanmar to hold first general election since 2021 coup
item.description: Critics have denounced the vote as a sham that will be used to entrench the military government's power.

item.title: Stronger and bigger Hurricane Erin forecast to create dangerous surf along US coast
item.description: Hurricane Erin pelted parts of the Caribbean and was forecast to create dangerous surf and rip currents along the U.S. East Coast this week.

item.title: Hurricane Erin likely to bring East Coast "life-threatening" surf, rip currents
item.description: Erin is the first hurricane to develop over the Atlantic this year, and meteorologists are closely tracking its path and forecast.

item.title: BBC witnesses West Bank attack by masked Israeli settlers
item.description: The BBC's Lucy Williamson says the incident near Nablus was "completely unprovoked".

item.title: Hurricane threatens US East Coast with life-threatening waves
item.description: The Category 4 storm threatens to bring life-threatening surf and rip currents to the US East Coast.

item.title: Rescuers in Nigeria search for dozens missing after boat capsizes
item.description: Safety regulations are rarely enforced leading to a large number of accidents on the waterways.

item.title: 7 killed in pool hall shooting weeks after massacre at different pool hall
item.description: A similar pool hall massacre took place last month in the southwestern tourist city of General Villamil Playas, leaving at least nine dead.
